# The posix extension

Configure the `posix` extension.

This extension provides support for POSIX-like functions.

> [!NOTE]
> This extension is available only on \*nix systems.

## PHP_EXT_POSIX

* Default: `ON`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Enable the extension.

## PHP_EXT_POSIX_SHARED

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Build extension as shared.
